mapper.select: select id from zdqsn_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from azb_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from xd_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from zszh_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from sqjzpeople_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from sfpeople_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from staypeople_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from engpeople_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from party_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from bear_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from militaryservice_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from xmsfpeople_info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}
select id from cx_Info where person_baseinfo_id=#{userid}

select c.id as lsryId from person_baseinfo b LEFT JOIN staypeople_info c ON b.id=c.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN engpeople_info d on b.id=d.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN party_info e on b.id=e.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN bear_info f on b.id=f.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN militaryservice_info g on b.id=g.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN xmsfpeople_info h on b.id=h.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN cx_Info i on b.id=i.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN sfpeople_info j on b.id=j.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN sqjzpeople_info k on b.id=k.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN zszh_info l on b.id=l.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN xd_info m on b.id=m.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN azb_info n on b.id=n.person_baseinfo_id LEFT JOIN zdqsn_info o on b.id=o.person_baseinfo_id where b.id=#{userid}
